jobDescription:
Releaf Society LLC is currently hiring for the following positions: 

Trim Team Specialist.
Harvest Helpers

Compensation: $15-$20/hour 
Paid Weekly 

Requirements: 
Minimum of (1) year experience of cannabis production preferred.
Marijuana Workers Permit preferred, but not required to start........Go to oregon.gov to apply
Reliable transportation to/from the job site
TrimTools (Fiskars/Trim tray)
*Pass background check

Here's the rundown...8-hour shifts are required, No half days are allowed. All Team Members are expected to be punctual, professional and maintain strong work ethic 100% of the time. No drama allowed.

We have accounts all over Oregon so if you need to relocate w/ can help keep you busy. We understand that some of our Team Members have kids/family/prior obligations. As far as scheduling, We are very flexible. You just let us know the days you're available or need off and we will adjust the schedule accordingly. We have plenty of active accounts in the area with many jobs running well into 2018.

If you meet all the necessary requirements and would like to join the Releaf Society Team call (541)797-7935. 
Go to our website to apply. www.releafsociety.com


Check out our Instagram @releafsocietyllc to see what we have been up to around the state
